Subject: Hostage Negotiations
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron/Koga Shuko/Ramhorn/Anubis/Hades:



Unitron chuckled, his optics looking into Spears.

Shuko yelled, Anubis and Hades taking his shots, both firing a rocket from 
the missile launchers at Hot Rod's feet.

"This is your idea of negotiations!?  Predacon's on crack are more 
trustworthy than you!  Yes, a cease fire and a cease of attacks for five days 
from us, and 50 kilos of liquid energon to seal the deal, KEEP YOUR MEN AT 
BAY!"

Ramhorn laughed.  "Bullslag!  Shoot the slagging piles of scrap!  Shoot them! 
 One Maximal for several Predacons is worth my death!"
